review: I love it. It's really simple to use
author: Juan F. Paulini

review: Works like a charm. I was using out Xbox for streaming Netflix and such but with the cost of Xbox live.. I decided to take my coworkers advice and purchase Chromecast. Low cost high reward, product works great for what I need. No need to buy Apple TV at this point.
author: yajaira

review: Its convenient, but the playback you get from videos is not nearly as good as using an HDMI cable. It was pretty choppy for me. My internet connection is fine, not anything amazingly fast, but my laptop is a new MacBook pro which is ample power for this.
author: Goldy

review: I just bought it out of curiosity and for $25 I have passed it on to my brother.He only wants Netflix then it’s good.I have Intel NUC with win 8.1 connected to my TV it does everything I want it to do.
author: Michael Tschernia

review: Not worth the money, ruku works much, much better.
author: John A. Jauss

review: Excellent product, works like a charm!
author: Henry Johnson
